author: Simon Difford
description: As the name suggests, this riff on a Brandy Alexander has a delicately spicy finish that cuts through the creaminess.
name: Spiced Alexander
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
15 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
